mapper.select:
select
from place_record pr inner join place p on pr.place_id=p.place_id
pr.user_Id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by pr.create_time desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM place_record WHERE order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND place_id=#{placeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ((#{orderStartTime, jdbcType=TIME}<=order_end_time AND #{orderStartTime, jdbcType=TIME}>order_start_time AND #{orderEndTime,jdbcType=TIME} >=order_end_time) OR
(#{orderEndTime,jdbcType=TIME}<=order_end_time AND #{orderEndTime,jdbcType=TIME}>order_start_time AND #{orderStartTime, jdbcType=TIME} <=order_start_time) OR
(#{orderStartTime, jdbcType=TIME}>order_start_time AND #{orderEndTime,jdbcType=TIME} <order_end_time) OR (#{orderStartTime, jdbcType=TIME}<order_start_time AND #{orderEndTime,jdbcType=TIME} >order_end_time))

update place_record
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
place_id = #{placeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
